name: Kelvin L. Dias
content: Kelvin Lopes Dias - CIn UFPE Kelvin Lopes Dias Associate Professor Home Research Interests Publications Courses Research Projects Activities Short Bio Prof. Kelvin received a DSc. degree in computer science from the Federal University of Pernambuco (UFPE), Recife-Brazil, in 2004. Since 2010 he has been an associate professor at the Center of Informatics (CIn) of the UFPE. From 2013 to 2015 he was director of networks and datacenter in NTI-UFPE, the Information and Communications Technology (ICT) Center of UFPE. He is recipient of the CNPq Research Productivity Award (PQ-2). Professor Kelvin coordinated/collaborated in projects funded by CNPq, CTIC - RNP, Ericsson and LeNovo/Motorola Mobility. His current teaching activities and research interests are in the field of computer and communications networks. - Curriculum Lattes: (in portuguese) - Contact:
